div.p: This value set expansion contains 3 concepts.

td.a: First varicella dose from the primary series was administered-128

tr.td: First varicella dose from the primary series was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "Varicella-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") =1

td.a: Second varicella dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-107

tr.td: Second varicella dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Varicella-containing vaccines")"

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SVaricella2Doses for IMMZ.D18.S.Varicella.2-dose schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a varicella vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: 2-dose schedule
